column1: '''''The Boggit''''' is a parody of the [[1982]] video game ''[[The Hobbit (1982 video game)
column2: The Hobbit]]'', being the sequel to the [[1985]] game ''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)
column3: Bored of the Rings]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/boggit.html Tolkien Games] (retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref> The game was written by [[Fergus McNeill]] and [[Judith Child]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="Spectrum"/>

column1: It is divided into three parts, and includes a hidden game.<ref>[http://www.jonlan.demon.co.uk/spectrum/gamefaq/gamefaq5.html#5.3 The Spectrum Games FAQ] (retrieved 26 October 2010)</ref>
